Name: Yumeutsutsu Re:Idol
About the game: WARNING: Only available in Japanese. Short Story spin-off to Yumeutsutsu Re:Master. Great as a short introduction to the world of Yumeutsutsu, or to complete your collection. Features a Visual Novel part and a Music Action game! In the outskirts of the Imperial City Tokyo, in a small town where the good habits of old still endure, the indie studio Eureka Soft has its discreet office. In the reunion room, the air is charged heavily with tension. The fate of Eureka Soft hangs on the discussions currently underway... nay, the fate of the whole world! Employees air their grievances without finding solutions. Anger flares, words are exchanged. If you listen, mysterious words stand out: alien, chunibyo, kansai dialect, obsessed... ... and so, Ai Ohtori stands on the stage, on the beach, aiming to become a top Idol! For the future of Eureka Soft, and the fate of the world. Staff Character design, Main artist Fuzichoko Scenario Hio Kosaka Cast and voice actors Ai Ohtori (Personality-less heroine): Maya Yoshioka Kokoro Yanagiya (Young sister): Manami Numakura Saki Mugendou (Scenarist): Tokui Aozora Nana Tachibana (Vocal artist): Izawa Shiori Marie Mahler (Artist): Ikezawa Haruna Honoka Daigo (Programmer & CEO): Itou Shizuka Banako (dog): Ohtsubo Yuka Hatei (Director of PD team): Ko Mazuru Main Theme 'One heart' - Ai Ohtori solo ver. Song: Ai Ohtori (Voice: Maya Yoshioka) Writer: Riko Azuna
